mapper.select: select c.id cid, c.nickname, c.email, c.content, c.avatar, c.admincomment, c.create_time, c.blog_id, c.parent_comment_id, b.id bid, c.reply_comment_id, c.reply_email from b_comment c, b_blog b where c.blog_id = b.id and c.blog_id = #{blogId} and c.parent_comment_id = #{blogParentId} order by c.create_time desc

select c.id cid, c.nickname, c.email, c.content, c.avatar, c.admincomment, c.create_time, c.blog_id, c.parent_comment_id, c.reply_comment_id, c.reply_email from b_comment c where c.parent_comment_id = #{commentId}
select id, nickname, email, content, avatar, create_time, blog_id, parent_comment_id, admincomment, reply_comment_id, reply_email from b_comment where id=#{replyCommentId}
mapper.insert: insert into b_comment (nickname,email,content,avatar, create_time,blog_id,parent_comment_id, reply_comment_id, admincomment, reply_email) values (#{nickname},#{email},#{content},#{avatar}, #{createTime},#{blogId},#{parentCommentId}, #{replyCommentId}, #{adminComment}, #{replyEmail});
mapper.delete: delete b_comment from b_comment where b_comment.id = #{id};
mapper.select: select c.id cid, c.nickname, c.email, c.content, c.avatar, c.admincomment, c.create_time, c.blog_id, c.parent_comment_id, c.reply_comment_id, c.reply_email from b_comment c where c.id = #{id}
